mapper.select: select s.*,g.name gname,st.name sname from t_student s left join t_grade g on s.gid=g.id left join t_staff st on s.introno=st.no where s.flag=1 and s.no=#{no}
select count(*) from t_student where flag=1
select count(*) from t_student where flag=1 and gid=#{gid}
mapper.update: update t_student set photo=#{photo} where no=#{no}
